title: What will be the salary of a SAP ABAP? - Quora

response.answer_text: Salary; It depends a lot on your experience. The common misconception is that if you work in SAP you will get lots of money!  You have to work very hard for it, and it will not just fall in your lap.  Many people have to work many years before they can command the salaries they get, otherwise, they go freelance, and the work is not always there.Average SAP ABAP Developer salaries for job postings nationwide Might help you.

Frankly speaking you are paid the same package for working in abap as for working in any other domains. People who are passionate will be more productive/innovative and paid well. I have seen people.with excellent packages working in testing/wcs/pega/websphere. There are also people who get less in sap.abap as well. There is a misconception in everyone and it just lead to overcrowded sap aspirants everywhere. This simply helps institutes to fill their seats.

If you are working for service company in US  then salary can be between 65K to 79K.Product companies pay higher in the range of 70K to 89K. If you work as an independent contractor then salary can go beyond 100K easily .
